title: Intergenerational Learning Simulation: VR-Based Café Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic communication skills and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Students (20s) and seniors (65+) simulate café roles in VR environments for mutual learning. They use BYOD tablets/smartphones to implement conversations and activities in virtual spaces

learning_goals: Learners can understand generational cultural differences and apply three or more effective communication strategies in VR environments.
Learners can complete a two-week virtual café operation simulation in collaboration with senior participants while performing project-based tasks.
Learners can submit a one-page action plan to address social biases based on intergenerational learning experiences.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
